Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2023e1.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterUserCI

All Superinterfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, HeaterUserAndControlI, HeaterUserAndExternalControlI, HeaterUserImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
HeaterUserConnector, HeaterUserInboundPort, HeaterUserOutboundPort
public interface HeaterUserCI extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, HeaterUserImplI
The component interface HeaterUserCI declares the signature of the services offered and that can be required by the user from the heater.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      getCurrentPowerLevel() <= getMaxPowerLevel()

Created on : 2023-09-18

Author:
Jacques Malenfant

    getCurrentPowerLevel()
    return the current power level of the heater.

    return true if the heater is currently running.
    void

    set the power level of the heater; if powerLevel > getMaxPowerLevel() then set the power level to the maximum.

    set the target temperature.
    void
    switchOff()
    switch off the heater.
    void
